data.description: Julia Roberts and Ethan Hawke star as a couple battling societal breakdown when the technology that underpins civilisation collapses.

data.description: Juan Alessi, who worked at Epstein's Palm Beach residence, said both Prince Andrew and his then wife Sarah, Duchess of York, were friends with him and sex-trafficker Ghislaine Maxwell.
